subject: Getting assertion comments output when using TextRunner
msgSnippet: I work in an environment that requires that the comment of an assertion be output as well as any data compared, and this must be present for both success and
messageBody:
I work in an environment that requires that the comment of an
assertion be output as well as any data compared, and this must be
present for both success and failure cases. Some of the other
frameworks (utPLSQL, for example) already do this, but TextRunner
seems to output next to nothing.

Is there some setting or addon that we can use to have this
information output as well? (Short of modifying the Assert class, of
course.)

(I know there is discussion about whether such output has value. The
environment I'm working in requires FDA-specified validation, and at
least the values being compared have to be reviewed by a human being
before a final approval signature can be applied. Therefore, a
simple "OK" is insufficient to to pass review.)

Thank you for your insight!

Jeff
